TopicTitle: Accents not displayed correctly in the name of the rockets

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I'm using French accents (ÃƒÂ©) to name my rockets, and those characters are not displayed correctly in some places of the game:

- while building a rocket the accents are always too big, like twice bigger than other letters

- while launching a rocket they are also too big

- in the tracking station accents are completely missing in the panel with the description of a tracked object

I am using the latest Steam version of the game, on Windows 8.

This is more of a missing feature than a bug -- some of the in-game fonts are, as far as I know, created by Squad themselves... and they haven't got Unicode support. I'd suspect what you're seeing is Unity substituting the next-best font available that can render the characters you're using.

Feel free to submit a Feedback report concerning this on the Bug Tracker, if there isn't one already... though, now that I think of it, there may well be one already. I think this was brought up not a couple of months back, actually.
I found this bug in the bug-tracker which is addressing the first of my screenshots: http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/2857

The second, being the same font, is the same issue. The third screenshot, however... is definitely a bit of a different thing, and may warrant either an addition to that report or possibly a second report. Might be a good idea to add these screenshots to the existing report.
